projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
When running Geolocation second time after reinstallation or killing app, it doesn't show "Revers Geo", "Current location", and "Updated location" info.
Also occurs in 1.8.2

Steps:
1. Reinstall or kill KitchenSink, if it's already installed.
2. Run KitchenSink
3. Go to "Phone-Geolocation"
4. Go back
5. Launch "Geolocation" second time

Expected result:
Every time when running Geolocation, all information should be presented.

Actual result:
After second time launching Geolocation it doesn't show "Revers Geo", "Current location", and "Updated location" info.
fields.summary: iOS: Geolocation - Doesn't show "Reverse Geo", "Current location", and "Updated location" info

comments.body:
Issue does not reproduces 

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0

Issue does not reproduces

Tested with

iOS SDK: 5.1
iOS iPad Simulator: 5.1
Mac OS X Version 10.7.5
Titanium SDK version 3.1.1.v20130606121419
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
